question: Which of the following are the basin countries of the "Lempa River"?
explanation: El Salvador, Honduras and Guatemala are the basin countries of the "Lempa River". The Lempa River is a 422-kilometre long river in Central America. There are several hydroelectric dams along the river. In El Salvador, there is the Guayojo dam, the Cerron Grande Hydroelectric Dam, the 5 de Noviembre dam, and the 15 de Septiembre dam which can be easily seen from the Pan-American highway.
